channel.title: Hearts of Wulin for fans (or potential fans) of wuxia (oneshots using simplified playtest rules)
channel.description:
[GAME DOC] [simplified oneshot documentation](https://www.dropbox.com/s/kyt3vkkxex4hzyi/heartsofwulin_simpleoneshot.pdf?dl=0) (examples of simplification: only 1 entanglement per player-character, faction optional, direct romance optional, playbook role's custom moves limited to its titular custom move)
These oneshots are meant to be independent of each other, such that anyone can join any session and only play one session. But if at any time the same group of players continues to play together, I'm happy to extend storylines for the same characters. (I really want to play a campaign anyway :innocent: )
